sentences.en: A Catalan speciality is to serve salt cod cold.
sentences.cn: 冷盘咸鳕鱼是加泰罗尼亚的一道特色菜。

sentences.en: After the acclimation, the removals of BAA and COD reach 90 % and 50 %, respectively.
sentences.cn: 驯化期结束后, 活性污泥对溴氨酸的脱色率和COD去除率分别达90%和50%以上.

sentences.en: Cod - liver oil is a tonic.
Cod are found in the North Atlantic and the North Sea.
sentences.cn: 北大西洋和北海有鳕鱼.

sentences.en: Recommended equations used for estimating crack opening displacement ( COD ) were given.
sentences.cn: 文中给出了推荐的高应变区裂纹张开位移 ( COD ) 估算式.

sentences.en: Silver sulfate is used in National Standard as catalyst to determine chemical oxygen demand ( COD ).
sentences.cn: 对化学需氧量 ( COD ) 的测定,在国标方法中是以硫酸银做催化剂.

sentences.en: The COD was reduced in the liquid after the yeast was cultured.
sentences.cn: 经酵母培养后的液体的COD值有所降低,减轻了污染程度.

sentences.en: The existence of Cl - will make big disturbance to the determination of COD.
sentences.cn: 的存在会对COD的测定造成较大的干扰.

sentences.en: The main pollutant indexes in the river are COD and total Hg.
sentences.cn: 河水的主要污染成分为COD和总汞.

sentences.en: The removal rates of color and COD are over 95 % and % respectively.
sentences.cn: 对各种模拟废水和实际废水,FAS的 脱色率95%,对COD的去除率则在90%以上.

sentences.en: They salt down cod for winter use.
sentences.cn: 他们腌鳕鱼留着冬天吃.

sentences.en: They unloaded their catch of cod and bass.
sentences.cn: 他们把捕到的鳕鱼和鲈鱼卸下来。

sentences.en: Wastewater from textile finishing operations is colored and contains COD and salt.
sentences.cn: 从纺织印染厂排出的废水带有颜色,含COD和盐污染.

trans.tran_cn: 货到付款 (Cash on Delivery) n鳕鱼

trans.tran_en: a large sea fish that lives in the North Atlantic
